name: Kayaking on Lady Bird Lake
description: Join us for a peaceful morning of kayaking on the serene waters of Lady Bird Lake. Take in the beautiful views of downtown Austin as we paddle along the lake. Beginners welcome!

name: Hiking at Barton Creek Greenbelt
description: Get ready for an adventurous hike through the scenic trails of Barton Creek Greenbelt. Explore the lush greenery, natural swimming holes, and breathtaking waterfalls. All skill levels are encouraged to join!

name: Paddleboarding on Lake Travis
description: Experience the thrill of paddleboarding on the expansive waters of Lake Travis. Enjoy the stunning sunset views while gliding across the lake. No experience necessary!
